target.generate: SCHEMA: person(ssn, surname, name, boss) INSTANCE: person(ssn: "123", surname: "Smith", name: "John", boss: "Boss") person(ssn: "123", surname: "White", name: "Walter", boss: "Boss") person(ssn: "123", surname: "James", name: "Mc Gill", boss: "Boss")

scenario.dependencies: ExtEGDs: e0: person(ssn: $ssn, surname: $surname1, name: $name1, boss: $boss1), person(ssn: $ssn, surname: $surname2, name: $name2, boss: $boss2) -> $surname1 == $surname2.
